Peter Heine Nielsen vs Luke McShane
Politiken Cup 25th (2003), Copenhagen, rd 7, Jul-14
Gruenfeld Defense: Exchange Variation (D85)

1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 g6 3. Nc3 d5 4. cd5 Nd5 5. e4 Nc3 6. bc3 c5 7. Bc4 Bg7 8. Ne2 Nc6 9. Be3 cd4 10. cd4 Qa5 11. Bd2 Qd8 12. d5 Ne5 13. Bc3 O-O 14. Bb3 Qb6 15. f4 Nd7 16. Bg7 Kg7 17. Rc1 Rd8 18. Rc4 e5 19. Qa1 f6 20. Qc3 ef4 21. Nf4 Ne5 22. Rc7 Kh8 23. Rf1 Bd7 24. Ne6 Rdc8 25. Rf6 Rc7 26. Rf8 Rf8 27. Qe5

judgment.name: Mistake
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Qd6 was best.
